thread.section_title: Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Anniversary in Paris
thread.title_full: Anniversary in Paris - Review of Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Catherine A
title: Anniversary in Paris
text:
We stayed at this gem of a hotel and cannot say enough about it. Its location is excellent, tucked away on a side street close to the Louvre with everything in walking distance. Fantastic staff made our short stay very special, rooms were tasteful, spotless and well equipped.
We would recommend this Hotel without any hesitation and will definitely return in the near future.
